notes.title: Day 1 â€“ Atomic Habits
notes.content: Atomic Habits book ka start. Aaj ka focus hai chhoti habits aur daily consistency.

notes.title: System over Goal Rule
notes.content: Success ya failure goal se nahi, system se decide hota hai.

notes.title: Meaning
notes.content: Goal sirf direction deta hai. Roz ka routine aur habit decide karti hai ki tum goal tak pahunchoge ya nahi. Strong system ho to result apne aap aata hai.

notes.title: Example
notes.content: 2 students ka goal same hai top marks. Ek roz 30 min padhta hai, dusra exam se pehle. Jeet wahi jata hai jo daily padhta hai. Goal same, system alag.

notes.title: Positive Impact
notes.content: Chhoti habits follow karne se pressure kam hota hai. Motivation ka wait nahi karna padta. Discipline aur confidence dheere-dheere build hota hai.

notes.title: Takeaway ðŸŽ¯
bullets: Goal se zyada system important hai
Roz ka chhota kaam bada result deta hai
